text1: People gift you on your birthday, but the reality is you, yourself is a biggest gift to me (and the whole humanity!)
sendButtonLabel: Send to the best person on this Earth
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are...well, the the the best person on this Earth and tbh I am obsessed with you :-).
outroText: Shy thoda sa, this is cheesy. Let's pretend you never saw this.
replayText: Or meh, click if you want to watch it again.
